com.jaunt.component

Class Hyperlink

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jaunt.component.Hyperlink

  • public class Hyperlink
extends Object
    Represents a hyperlink.
    Since:
    0.9.0
    Author:
    Tom Cervenka

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      Element element
      The Element representing the hyperlink.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Hyperlink(Element anchorElement, UserAgent userAgent)
      Creates a Hyperlink component to represent the specified anchor element.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Document follow()
      Performs a virtual click of the hyperlink; directs the UserAgent to the url specified by the href property.
      Element getElement()
      Retrieves the Element for the hyperlink.
      String getHref()
      Returns the href value of the hyperlink or null if the href attribute does not exist.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • element

        public Element element
        The Element representing the hyperlink.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Hyperlink

        public Hyperlink(Element anchorElement,
         UserAgent userAgent)
          throws NotFound
        Creates a Hyperlink component to represent the specified anchor element.
        Parameters:
        userAgent - the userAgent.
        anchorElement - the element for this hyperlink; the element must contain an href attribute, otherwise a NotFound Exception is thrown.
        Throws:
        NotFound

    • Method Detail

      • getElement

        public Element getElement()
        Retrieves the Element for the hyperlink.

      • getHref

        public String getHref()
        Returns the href value of the hyperlink or null if the href attribute does not exist.

      • follow

        public Document follow()
                throws ResponseException
        Performs a virtual click of the hyperlink; directs the UserAgent to the url specified by the href property.
        Throws:
        ResponseException
